title: submitseed request parameters
description: Submit new seed for getting the new staking block pre-seal hash

items.description: seed: 128 hex decimal characters with 0x prefix seed of block (n+1).
signing public key: 64 hex decimal characters with 0x prefix signing public key of block (n + 1) .
coinbaase: 64 hex decimal characters with 0x prefix coinbase of block (n + 1) .
